title: AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Project Coordinator Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS Rishikesh) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Project Coordinator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you...
